headline: Broadridge to Acquire Acolin, Accelerating Modernization and Transparency in Cross-Border Fund Distribution
summary: Global Fintech leader Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:BR) today announced its agreement to acquire Acolin, a leading European provider of cross-border fund distribution and regulatory services. The acquisition will create a robust pan-European fund distribution network, facilitating broader, more efficient access to investors and distribution partners while supporting the ongoing transformation and efficiency of fund distribution for asset managers worldwide.

headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR) entered into an agreement to acquire Acolin Infotech AG.
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. entered into an agreement to acquire Acolin Infotech AG on July 3, 2025. The transaction is expected to close in the first half of Broadridge's 2026 fiscal year,...
